subject: Olympic Games (1964)
Figure Skating
lead_paragraph: The figure skaters Ronald and Vivian Joseph, a brother-and-sister pairs team, competed for the United States, ultimately winning a medal. But the final result came into question years later.
snippet: The figure skaters Ronald and Vivian Joseph, a brother-and-sister pairs team, competed for the United States, ultimately winning a medal. But the final result came into question years later.
